title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Cooperating Association
body: Cooperating Association       The Ocmulgee National Monument Association (ONMA) is a nonprofit cooperating association working in partnership with the National Park Service. Established in 1942, the purpose of the ONMA is to support interpretive and educational programs at Ocmulgee National Monument. To accomplish these objectives, the ONMA operates the museum bookstore and offers memberships to the public. Visit the website www.ocmulgeemounds.org email onma@ocmulgeemounds.org phone (478) 752-8257 ext. 214
